reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 61/98: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES -  LIQUOR LICENCE ACT

reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 61/98: ASSIGNMENT OF POWERS AND DUTIES -  LIQUOR LICENCE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996

content.content:
2. References to the Board, a member or members of the Board or an employee or employees of the Board found in the provisions of the Liquor Licence Act referenced in Column 1 of the Table and described opposite in Column 2 shall be read as references to the board of the Alcohol and Gaming Commission of Ontario or the Registrar of Alcohol and Gaming, as the case may be, as set out in Column 3. O. Reg. 61/98, s. 2. TABLE  Item

Column 1

Column 2

Column 3


1.

Subsection 6 (4.2)

Reference to Board — consideration of financial relationship and public interest

Registrar O. Reg. 22/03, s. 2. Français
